content.raw:
1. The harness drop appears to take from 8 to 12 seconds. I'm considering putting a timer  that measures the harness drop period, issues a log message if the timer expires, and notify my console. I'm thinking of a 20 second timer. Would that be a valid time limit? (Simulated time, of course.)

1. In my experience retrying a harness drop is more likely to fail than succeed. I propose existing my code at that point and requesting a restart at that checkpoint. Is that acceptable? 

These actions will speed the processing of my entry since the amount of waiting on retries will be minimized.
